TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlSchemaInfo extends System.Object implements class System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo

Docs.summary: Represents the post-schema-validation infoset of a validated XML node.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example validates the `contosoBooks.xml` file against the `contosoBooks.xsd` schema. The example uses the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class to deserialize the `contosoBooks.xml` file and pass the value of the nodes to the methods of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> class.
[!code-cs[XmlSchemaValidatorExamples#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.schema.xmls_16_1.cs)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaValidatorExamples#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.schema.xmls_16_1.vb)]
The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as input.
[!code-xml[XPathXMLExamples#2](~/add/codesnippet/xml/t-system.xml.schema.xmls_16_2.xml)]
The example also takes the `contosoBooks.xsd` as an input.
[!code-xml[XPathXMLExamples#3](~/add/codesnippet/xml/t-system.xml.schema.xmls_16_3.xsd)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples For an example of the XmlSchemaInfo constructor, see the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo> class reference topic.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the object that corresponds to the content type of this validated XML node.
Gets or sets a value indicating if this validated XML node was set as the result of a default being applied during XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schema validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The IsDefault property does not report DTD defaults.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating if the value for this validated XML node is nil.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of an XML node is nil if its `xsi:nil` attribute is `true`.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the dynamic schema type for this validated XML node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The MemberType property is set only if the static type of the XML node is a union type in which case the MemberType property will return the type from the union the XML node validated against.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the compiled object that corresponds to this validated XML node.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example validates the `contosoBooks.xml` file against the `contosoBooks.xsd` schema. The example uses the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class to deserialize the `contosoBooks.xml` file and pass the value of the nodes to the methods of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> class.
[!code-cs[XmlSchemaValidatorExamples#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.xml.schema.xmls_5_1.cs)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaValidatorExamples#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.xml.schema.xmls_5_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the compiled object that corresponds to this validated XML node.

remarks.format:

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the static XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schema type of this validated XML node.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The static type of an XML node is the type that was declared in the XSD schema.
## Examples The following example validates the `contosoBooks.xml` file against the `contosoBooks.xsd` schema. The example uses the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class to deserialize the `contosoBooks.xml` file and pass the value of the nodes to the methods of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> class.
[!code-cs[XmlSchemaValidatorExamples#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.xml.schema.xmls_2_1.cs)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaValidatorExamples#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.xml.schema.xmls_2_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the value of this validated XML node.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The possible <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidity> values for this XML node are <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidity>, <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidity>, and <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidity>.
